content: अर्चिष्मत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अस्त्यर्थे मतुप्] Flaming, brilliant, bright; <ls>V. 3. 2.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} Fire, the god of fire. {@--2@} The sun. {@--3@} A sort of subordinate deity. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. --ती {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the town or world of Agni. {@--2@} One of the 10 earths according to Buddhists.
